Trainer class for supervised learning.

Parameters

  • cfg (yacs.config.CfgNode) â YACS configuration options.

  • device (torch.device) â model running device. GPUs are recommended for model training and inference.

  • mode (str) â running mode of the trainer ('train' or 'test'). Default: 'train'

  • rank (int, optional) â node rank for distributed training. Default: None

  • checkpoint (str, optional) â the checkpoint file to be loaded. Default: None
